title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: Energy Minister Angus Taylor has refused to elaborate on claims he used a fraudulent document to attack the City of Sydney Council. Mr Taylor's office gave the document to the media and claimed the council had spent over $15 million on travel and attacked mayor Clover Moore for hypocrisy on climate change. The real figure was less than $6,000, which has raised questions about where Taylor's office sourced the document. Labor has referred the matter to NSW police. Mr Taylor has confirmed he will send a letter to Moore apologising for "getting the figures wrong" but refused three times to be drawn further. Image: News Corp Australia
